description:
This brushed aluminum repeller fits in with any patio set. Create an invisible barrier that keeps bugs away, without needing to put anything on your skin. Easy to use and scent free, place the Shield on your patio or by the hammock, turn it on and within minutes you'll have a 5m dome of protection. Turning the Repeller on and off is as easy as a twist, and each colour-coded mat provides up to 4 hours of protection.

  • 5m dome of protection in 10–30 minutes
  • Each mat lasts for up to 4 hours and goes from blue to white once empty, making it easy to know when to change the mat
  • Internal butane canister lasts for up 12 hours
  • Simple twist-on, twist-off operation
  • No open flame, smouldering coil or scent
  • Compact design is easy to take with you
  • Internal storage for extra mats
  • Active ingredient: D-cis/trans allethrin
  • Dimensions: 10 x 12.5 x 23cm
  • In the box: Metal Edition Patio Shield Repeller and 12 hours of refills - 3 repellent mats and 1 fuel cartridge
name: Thermacell Metal Edition Patio Shield Mosquito Repeller
